name: questioning
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the situation in which the police ask someone questions about a crime: Three suspects were taken in by police for questioning.

questioning adjective
(DOUBTFUL)
(of someone's expression) expressing doubts about the value or truth of something; showing that you want an answer about something: The men exchanged a questioning glance. "Wouldn't you?" Graham replied with a questioning look.

questioning adjective
(UNCERTAIN ABOUT GENDER)
not willing or not yet able to say what your gender identity or sexual orientation is : This book is for all the children born non-binary, transgender, gender fluid, lesbian, gay, straight or questioning. They wrote an article about school avoidance among lesbian, gay, bisexual, and questioning youths.
